samples.instruction: Medical negligence case-kku enna evidence venum?
samples.current_output: Required: 1) All medical records (hospital bound to give), 2) Prescriptions, 3) Test reports, 4) Bills, 5) Expert medical opinion (another doctor's opinion), 6) Death certificate (if applicable). RTI moolam government hospital records peralaam.

samples.current_output: Complaint: Drug Inspector (District), State Drug Control. Legal Metrology Department-à®‰à®®à¯ complaint à®à®Ÿà¯à®•à¯à®•à¯à®®à¯. Pharmacy license suspend/cancel à®†à®•à®²à®¾à®®à¯. Consumer forum-à®²à¯ compensation. Evidence: Bill with MRP comparison. Toll-free: 1800-11-4000.

samples.instruction: Apartment vaangum podhu UDS endraal enna?
samples.current_output: UDS = Undivided Share of Land. Flat owner-kku land-la proportionate share. Building collapse/demolish aanalum land share ungalukku. Higher UDS = Better value. UDS % sale deed-la clearly mention irukkanum. UDS illaama flat vaangaadheenga.

samples.instruction: Civil case file seyya enna procedure?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Lawyer consult, 2) Plaint draft, 3) Court fee pay, 4) Filing, 5) Summons to defendant, 6) Written statement, 7) Issues framing, 8) Evidence, 9) Arguments, 10) Judgment. Time: 2-5 years (varies). e-Courts: ecourts.gov.in case status track.

samples.instruction: Advance thirumba thara ethanai naal time irukku?
samples.current_output: Sattapadi veedu kaali seydha 30 days-kkul advance thirumba thara venum. Delay aanaal 6% interest-udan thara venum. Idhu 2017 Act-la clearly mention aagiyirukku.

Rejection reason check: passportindia.gov.in. Common reasons: Police verification issue, document mismatch, pending cases. Appeal: Regional Passport Officer. Court case pending: NOC from court required. Reapply with correct documents. Tatkaal for urgent cases.

Aama. Sections: IT Act 66A (struck down but alternatives exist), 67 (obscene content), IPC 509 (insult to modesty), 506 (criminal intimidation), 507 (criminal intimidation by anonymous). Platform report + cybercrime.gov.in complaint. Women: 181 helpline.

samples.instruction: Insurance claim reject aanaal enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Rejection reason written-aa kelunga, 2) Insurance company grievance cell, 3) Insurance Ombudsman (igms.irda.gov.in), 4) Consumer forum, 5) MACT (accident claims). Common rejection reasons: Policy lapse, drunk driving, unlicensed driver. Documentation mukkiyam.

Complaint options: 1) SP/DIG-kku written complaint, 2) Judicial Magistrate-kku complaint, 3) State Human Rights Commission, 4) National Human Rights Commission, 5) High Court writ petition. Medical report, photos, witnesses - evidence vaangunga. Custodial torture serious offence.

Options: 1) TANGEDCO helpline: 1912, 2) Online: tangedco.gov.in, 3) TNEB app, 4) Local section office. Issues: Billing errors, connection delay, power cut, meter fault. Escalation: AE â†’ EE â†’ SE â†’ CE. Consumer Grievance Redressal Forum (CGRF) for unresolved issues.

PG/Hostel license agreement-under varum, standard tenancy laws fully apply aagaadhu. But basic rights (security deposit refund, notice period, harassment protection) apply aagum. Specific PG rules follow pannanum.

Common conditions: 1) Court dates attend, 2) Don't leave jurisdiction without permission, 3) Don't tamper evidence/threaten witnesses, 4) Passport surrender (if flight risk), 5) Periodical police station visit, 6) Don't contact victim. Violation = bail cancel + arrest.

Types: 1) Third-party (mandatory) - others-kku damage cover, 2) Comprehensive - own vehicle + third party, 3) Own damage - only own vehicle. Third-party minimum kattaayam (MV Act). Without insurance driving: Rs.2,000 fine + vehicle seizure.

samples.instruction: Swiggy/Zomato delivery partner-kku labour laws apply aagumaa?
samples.current_output: Gig workers classified as 'independent contractors' - traditional labour laws fully apply aagaadhu. Code on Social Security 2020: Gig workers-kku social security provisions (implementation pending). Accident/injury-kku company insurance check pannunga. Union formation possible.

Dowry ketpathu/koduppathu illegal (Dowry Prohibition Act). Complaint: Police, Women helpline 181, Protection Officer. Punishment: 5 years imprisonment + fine. Dowry death (304B IPC): 7 years to life imprisonment. Evidence: Messages, recordings, witness statements.
